extendedInfo.description: Manage your own pirate bar in this cute and quirky restaurant management game. Serve your pirates beer, give 'em tattoos or let 'em rock out on the guitar!Rake up the doubloons with this fast-paced bar management game and try to get three stars each level!Eye patch not included.Features:- Cute pirates- Beer- Music- 15 levelsPRESS QUOTES"the gameplay's superb" - gizmodo.com"What's not to like?" - cnet.com"rather insane" - techradar.com"These pirates are adorable." - playandroid.com"It is definitely a unique game, sort of a diamond" - droidgamers.com"Barrr is like a young puppy: super cute and you want to play with it all the time." - androidgaming.nlPlease note: The new levels are mixed with the old levels. You'll have to play through the new ones to get to some of the old ones. You'll still have your hiscores though!This game requests permissions for the following usage:Keeping your phone from sleeping to prevent the screen going blank while playing.Internet access for Flurry analytics and improved error reporting (we don't collect private data such as usernames).Reading phone state to pause when you're being called.Have fun and keep yer pirates happy!

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Its a neat litlle bar game with a pirate twist. Graphics are smooth, colorful and cute. Its funny hearing the litte arrs from the customers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute, fun!
reviews.comment: Adorable and challenging, I had a little hard time tapping the right pirates that I meant to but all in all great game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great game, pretty addicting. Sucks I bet the lite version, might by the full. It will be worth it. Great game! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun cute game but...
reviews.comment: It keeps freezing up such that you can not tell them what to do (but the timer keeps going) resulting in a lower score.  Does not make the game unplayable, just frustrating when trying to get a high score.  Otherwise very cute and fun.  Fix the pausing bug and I will buy the full game...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice management game
reviews.comment: It\'s hard to find a restaurant management game that is good in android market. This game is good, with nice graphics too. It becomes quite repetitive after few levels for me, but mayne it\'s because I\'m not so into restaurant management games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game, nice graphics
reviews.comment: Pretty entertaining and fun game. Might not be for you if you\'re one of those people who get nervous when trying to do many things at once, though. I might purchase the paid version if they lower the price at some point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Adorable fun game
reviews.comment: I really, really enjoyed the strategy and multitasking that this game requires from the player. The game starts very easy and advances fast enough to kwep the user entertained. The pirates are enjoyable to watch while they\'re at their stations, so mind that you don\'t get too distracted!
reviews.author: Matt Boulanger

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: One of my favorite games. Cute, a great little time-waster, and runs perfectly on my Samsung Galaxy S3. Arrr!
reviews.author: Rebecca Cantrill

reviews.title: Fun but short
reviews.comment: Really fun but you have to buy full version after 15 levels :(
reviews.author: E DM

reviews.title: Loved it!
reviews.comment: I already finished it, so I am starting over. Thanks for the great game!
reviews.author: Emily Williams

reviews.title: Cute but boring
reviews.comment: Fun for 10 minutes, then it\'s just repetitive. Definitely nice art, tho.
reviews.author: govegg K

reviews.title: Fun but frustrating
reviews.comment: It is a fun game but freezes on occasion which can be very frustrating when trying to get a high score.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun and Easy to Handle
reviews.comment: A fun management game that uses tapping to different services stations and serving customers in that way compared to having to drag customers into seats etc. I love time management games but I rather play Diner Dash games on my laptop because it\'s easier so this game is perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Surprisingly fun
reviews.comment: thought prob be dumb, but  really cute, addictive n fun!Good amt of levels 4 a free trial too!!! I\'m happy! N not easily pleAsed btw lol . Lg optimus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: So adorable(\':
reviews.author: Kearsten Wyman

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game but you only get to play the demo which is 15 levels which you can complete in short time! I gave it only 3 stars because it freezes and because of that you can\'t get the 3 stars on some levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Only decent time management game I\'ve found on android. And demo was great enjoyed the number of levels
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game.
reviews.comment: Fun game. Only thing I dislike is that many times you tap on things and it doesn\'t register correctly.
reviews.author: Xanz Danget

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Really fun! You get to do a lot! Great demo just wish it lasted longer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freeze
reviews.comment: Randomly freezes and the little dudes will stand and pee themselves or get mad.
reviews.author: A Google User
